website_summaries.verdict: A great value – you get several vehicles, buildings, and mini figures for a reasonable price.
pros: Fire truck, helicopter, and police car – that's a lot of awesome vehicles in one set
The fire truck and helicopter shoot "fire" (blue discs)
The fire station includes bunk beds for on-call firefighters to rest
cons: It's hard to find cons with this popular set, but it is a bit expensive

customer_reviews.title: my husband, Robert, has had a stroke and ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband, Robert, has had a stroke and is paralyzed on his left (dominant side). this set has given him something to do to occupy his time. what he cannot put together with his one hand, I help him with. when he completes one of these sets, he feels proud that he has accomplished something!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cresap

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a kid, a nice big box for them to open and slowly pick apart and destroy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew slapped his hands over his mouth and practically screamed when he opened the box. The cute little guy loves it! At his age, he just mixes the pieces in with the sets he already has, but it was still worth it for that reaction. It's a nice kit, comes with a lot of little tableaus to create, like a hot dog cart on fire. The pole is pretty cool as well, the little Lego guys actually spin right down it. Which could get racy...but, come on, you heathens. This is a children's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We ended up ordering this at the last minute for Christmas since all of the stores in our area were sold out. Ended up costing us more than purchasing in the store; however our son was exciting to get the one item he really wanted for Christmas this last Christmas. Moral of the story. Get list ahead of time and don't wait to purchase, otherwise it will be costly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was sold out every where. Found on Amazon and was delivered promptly. Was a bit more than at the local target but was in-stock so was perfect to get via Amazon. There are about 10 bags of Legos in the box. Instructions are perfect. If for a 7 year old then will need adult help to manage and navigate. Recommend only opening the bags when doing the steps in the book. Unlike my kid who wanted to open all the bags at once....
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: EDUCATIONAL TOY
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Lego fan, by the end of last school year the only thing he asked for was a set of Lego, but a big one. I ordered these fire station and more happier he could not be. Educational and fun toy, which I recommend for every child.
customer_reviews.author: JohJoh

customer_reviews.title: Good price and awesome LEGO
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for a discounted price compared to LEGO store or Toys R Us. I always look for 15% to 20% discounts and compare to the physical LEGO store which is only few miles away. The discounted prices pretty much match the in-store red price stickers. As for the package, they are LEGO so they are awesome. My kid has been blessed and spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: neophyte226

customer_reviews.title: Everything for the Lego lover and Firefighter of ages 4 and up!
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible Lego package! Two fire engines, a fire station, a firefighter helicopter, a fire chief vehicle and a hot dog stand on fire are all included in this complete Lego package. My 4 year old grandson put this kit together with guidance from his parents. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: marye

customer_reviews.title: It is more for 5-6 years old than 4 years old (he could not do it alone but we had fun together).
customer_reviews.text: Lots of things to build divided into separate bags. Helicopter, fire truck, car, buildings. Took a month to complete (doing 1 lego bag every week-end with my 4 years old). It is more for 5-6 years old than 4 years old (he could not do it alone but we had fun together).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew. Although it is a great product that was priced reasonably and arrived right on time that is not the main reason for my fantastic review. Nothing can top you nephew saying "Thank you Aunt Janine you made my dreams come true!"
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a sale price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great LEGO set... HOWEVER, I would recommend waiting until you can catch this set on sale. The retail price is $99.99, which is a decent price when thinking about the piece count, but if you wait, I'll think you'll be rewarded with a better price. If the past is any indication of what will happen with this LEGO set prior to retirement (when the set is no longer sold), you'll have the opportunity to pick this set up at 30-40% off. Be patient... add this LEGO set to your Amazon list... be ready to pounce when the set goes on sale. Happy bricking!
customer_reviews.author: The LEGO GuyTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME gift for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was so thrilled with this lego set. He had it put together within 24 hours and just loves to play with it now with his emergency vehicles.

customer_reviews.title: Like all Lego products
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my grandson. He was ecstatic. Everything fit well, there were no pieces missing. Like all Lego products, they are grossly overpriced, but unique and fun to put together. The challenge is keeping them together.

product_meta.title: LEGO CITY Fire Station 60110
product_meta.description:
LEGO City's Fire Station has 2 garages and a firehouse with 3 floors and a fire pole, in 3 modular sections to build, with a total of 9 combinations for the main firehouse and garages. Features the fire chief's car, fire truck with cherry picker and a helicopter. This action-packed building toy includes 6 minifigures: 4 male firefighters, a female firefighter and a hot dog stand guy, plus a dog.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO
feature_bullets: Build a fire station, truck and helicopter loaded with gear
Includes 4 male firefighters, a female firefighter and a hot dog stand guy, plus a dog
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

Fire Station measures over 12” high, 16” wide and 9” deep. Fire truck measures over 3” high, 9” long and 2” wide. Helicopter measures over 3” high, 6” long and 1” wide. Fire chief’s car measures over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide. Hot dog stand measures over 2” high, 3” wide and 2” deep
919 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars459 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
